title: Top ten albums by Semilla
content:
[Sudtipos](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202235736/http:/www.sudtipos.com/) is proud to announce de release of a [Type Specimen "Top ten albums by Semilla Records](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202235736/http:/www.veer.com/download/pdf/semilla_specimen.pdf) for the just released [Semilla](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202235736/http:/sudtipos.com/fonts/116) font.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202235736im_/http:/typophile.com/files/typophilesemilla3_4378.jpg)

The specimen is a collection of fake album covers using the font. The artful photos used in this booklet are by French photographer and designer [St√©phane Giner](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202235736/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/stephaneginer/). He is very deserving of your patronage, so please keep an eye out for his marvelous work.

Best,  
Ale Paul

[Twitter Sudtipos](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202235736/http:/www.twitter.com/sudtipos)  
 [Facebook Sudtipos](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202235736/http:/www.facebook.com/sudtipos)
author: Ale Paul

comments.content:
I have to admit, I looove the idea of having fake album covers as / featuring the type specimen(s). Sooo good.

(And 'Semilla' is of course a lovely crafted, typical Sudtipos quality release, as well.)
Thanks Dav, is the way to be not bored doing font (at least one of the ways) lol
Both Semilla and the specimen look beautiful, Ale. Cheers!
